name: Vladimir Vlassov
content: KTH | Vladimir Vlassov Skip to main content Vladimir VlassovProfessorKungliga Tekniska Högskolanhttps://www.kth.se/profile/vladvDetailsWorks for Division of Software and Computer SystemsTelephone +46 8 790 41 15Unit address Lindstedtsvägen 30E-mail vladv@kth.seRoom2490ResearcherResearcher IDORCID IDWeb of Science ResearcherIDScopus IDAbout meVladimir Vlassov is a Full Professor of Computer Systems at KTH. His current research focuses on applied AI, scalable deep learning, natural language processing, stream processing, large-scale distributed systems, and cloud-based services. His broader interests include machine learning, cloud and distributed computing, and autonomic systems. He has contributed to several EU-funded projects under FP5–FP7 and Horizon 2020, as well as projects funded by Swedish research agencies and the Research Council of Norway.
